hero.subtitle: The ultimate AI tool for you
hero.description: A platform that helps you create images, videos, content, and run Facebook ads automatically using AI. No design or marketing skills needed.

section.title: Powerful Facebook Ads AI, Supports Creating Photos and Videos Up to 60 Seconds

features.title: Automated AI Advertising – Fast, Precise, Effective – Like a True Expert

content.heading: Analyze Your Fanpage
content.description: Our intelligent AI system not only helps you write engaging content, create professional images and videos, but also automatically analyzes your fanpage, identifies strengths and weaknesses, and suggests improvements and campaign optimizations tailored to your industry, audience, and goals.

content.heading: Ad Performance Analysis
content.description: Every step — from content creation to performance prediction — is fully handled by AI, saving time and boosting efficiency far beyond traditional manual methods.

features.title: AI-Powered Fanpage Analysis — Fast, Deep, and Accurate.

content.heading: Use AI to Analyze Your Ads
content.description: Simply enter your Fanpage link and our AI system will automatically evaluate all key factors: content quality, posting frequency, engagement effectiveness, response rate, brand visuals, and the appeal of each post. It will identify strengths and weaknesses and provide content optimization suggestions for specific industries, customer segments, and marketing objectives.

content.heading: Automatic Notifications
content.description: No more scattered manual analysis — now you can clearly understand your fanpage’s current status, what needs improvement, and what to do next, all in just seconds.

features.title: AI Video Creation – As Easy As Writing a Sentence.

content.heading: Just Enter Your Idea in Text
content.description: AI will automatically generate a dynamic, professional video with motion visuals, background music, and seamless editing.

content.heading: Fully Automated Video Editing
content.description: No need for editing software or a post-production team — videos up to 60 seconds long will be auto-generated for ads, product introductions, or social media. With customizable styles, sound, and editing pace, AI transforms any idea into a complete video in just a few minutes.

features.title: Create Professional Images with AI in Just Seconds.

content.heading: Use Smart AI to Generate Images
content.description: Enter your idea in text, and the system will automatically transform it into impressive, creative visuals aligned with your communication goals.

content.heading: Smart Layout and Framing
content.description: No design skills needed — you can still produce images for ads, posts, products, or branding with a variety of styles from realistic to animated, minimalist to cinematic. AI will suggest layouts, colors, and visual styles to save you hours of work while ensuring high aesthetics and visual impact.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose All One Ads
whyChoose.description: All One Ads is a next-gen advertising assistant powered by AI, helping you automatically create images, videos, content, and ad campaigns – saving time and cost while delivering outstanding results on Facebook.

features.heading: Easy-to-use AI – no tech skills needed
features.description: Anyone can use it – no ad knowledge required

features.heading: Ultra-fast content creation
features.description: No designer needed – AI handles it all

features.heading: Real advertising execution
features.description: Not just creating content – but actually launching ads effectively

list.name: Mr. Tiến
list.text: I'm not tech-savvy, but thanks to All One Ads, I can create mouth-watering food videos with just a few clicks. More customers come to the restaurant after each video!

list.name: Mr. Linh
list.text: We integrated All One Ads into BestMall’s marketing system. It saved our team dozens of hours every week while ensuring top-tier content quality.

list.name: Ms. Huệ
list.text: Previously I had to hire an entire media team for enrollment videos. Now I just input content, and All One Ads does the rest. Professional videos, great subtitles, and inquiries flood in!

list.name: Mr. Giang
list.username: Admin of AI Agent Vietnam Community
list.text: All One Ads truly is full-spectrum AI support. We use it daily to create content — from images, videos, captions to running ads — all automated!

list.name: Mr. Việt
list.text: We use All One Ads to promote events and courses. The AI-generated videos are great, content is clear, and it saves a lot of time.

list.name: Ms. Ngọc
list.text: I’ve been with All One Ads since the early UX days. Now I personally use it daily to simulate videos and create client content 5x faster!

footer.description:
AllOneAds.com is an AI-powered advertising platform that helps individuals and businesses easily create professional ad campaigns across multiple platforms in just minutes. With cutting-edge AI technology, All One Ads assists you in generating images, videos, content, and setting up Facebook ads quickly without needing design or advertising skills.

We are committed to delivering transparent, efficient, and cost-effective advertising solutions. Every process is optimized by AI to ensure quality content and continuous campaign improvement.

With All One Ads, you can confidently experience an intelligent auto-ad platform that enhances performance and helps your brand reach the right audience with ease.
footer.address: No. 1, Alley 75, Ho Tung Mau, Cau Giay District, Hanoi
